name: Execution of a Prisoner
description:
You don't know this man. You have no idea what he's done or why he's here.

All you know is that you've orders to kill him.

But why?

This is a game that I designed for my class. I didn't get a chance to flesh it out, so it's very short, but I feel like it says what it needs to say.

The original plan for the game had a lot more to say, and a good ending that allows you to release the prisoner. But alas, free Construct 2 has a limit on the amount of content that can go into a game. The original flowchart for the game was 2 pages long. This game shows about half a page of it.

Note: This game is the most popular out of all of the games I've made. I'd like you to know that it was the easiest to make and only took about a week. I am very salty about that.

Leave a comment if you actually enjoyed it. I have no idea why this game gets so many views. It really baffles me.
